name: Mountain Protocol USD
reason:
USDM is the first regulated permissionless yield-bearing stablecoin, backed by US Treasuries. Mountain Protocol is licensed and regulated by the Bermuda Monetary Authority (license #202302512).

Please visit the regulator's official website (https://bma.bm/regulated-entities) and search for “Mountain Protocol” to validate the regulatory nature of the business.

Smart Contract has been audited by OpenZeppelin. Full security details can be found in our Security Center: https://security.mountainprotocol.com/ and in our audit repository https://github.com/mountainprotocol/audits
